text: NBCSN was an American sports television channel. It was owned by the NBC Sports Group division of NBCUniversal, a subsidiary of Comcast. It showed sports programming. It started on July 1, 1995. The channel closed on December 31, 2021. Its sports properties moved to USA Network, Peacock, and other NBCUniversal networks. Category:American television channels Category:NBCUniversal Category:1995 establishments in the United States Category:2021 disestablishments in the United States
title: NBCSN
